title: Brutality in South Asian University
selftext: Just read [this](https://www.ndtv.com/blog/from-south-asian-university-expulsion-to-oxford-finally-i-can-tell-my-story-4190708), thought I'd share. Academics across the world have written, expressing solidarity with the suspended faculty. It's bizarre to find frequent instances of brazen oppression in educational institutions. What happened?
